rules.description: SpaceVIM: Space enables SpaceVIM mode. Press right command to toggle on/off. Do not use with the alternative rule.

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'display notification "Press right command to toggle on/off" with title "-- SPACEVIM ON --"'
osascript -e 'display notification "Press right command to toggle on/off" with title "-- SPACEVIM OFF --"'

rules.description: SpaceVIM: Right command enables SpaceVIM mode (alternative). Useful if you are a fast typer.
SpaceVIM: Space+b to Space (hold to repeat)
SpaceVIM: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceVIM: Space+4 to $(end), Space+6 to ^(jump to 1st non-blank character), Space+0 to 0(home).
SpaceVIM: Space+w, Space+b to move by word.
SpaceVIM: Space+v to toggle visual mode, Space+V to toggle linewise visual mode. (unstable with empty lines)
SpaceVIM: Space+u to undo, Space+ctrl+r to redo
SpaceVIM: Space+o or Space+O to append a new line above or below.
SpaceVIM: Space+gg or Space+G to go to the first or the last line.
SpaceVIM: Space+y to yank or Space+yy to yank a line.
SpaceVIM: Space+d to delete or Space+dd to delete a line.
